comment: Achille Emaná Edzimbi (born 5 June 1982), known as Emaná, is a Cameroonian professional footballer who plays for Cruz Azul in the Liga MX, as an attacking midfielder.He spent most of his professional career with Toulouse in France and Betis in Spain, playing his last years in Arab countries.Emaná gained nearly 50 caps for Cameroon, appearing with the country at the 2010 World Cup and three African Cup of Nations tournaments.
name: Achille Emana
